views.markdown:
Welcome to Trivice-Dark, a theme that plays with dark background and contrasting colors.

A flat color scheme will be added to the grey background, wich will give a new design to your device.

Tested under iOS 10/11.

Alternative applications are available just for native apps, to get back the blue color.

If you want more color to your theme, just go

You can always request applications that are not themed

are also possible to give me a Super Saiyan soul for future projects at this mail address.

We're well on our way to touching the 500 icons !


All new color scheme, if you want to stay with the gradient colors, place it somewhere safe to your device, it will be deleted at the next update.
